data.name: NoAuthenticationExists
data.value:
Access token is missing. Please re-authorize.
If problem persists, contact support.

data.name: msgAuthExpiredOrInvalid
data.value:
Access token is missing, expired, or invalid. Please re-authorize.
If problem persists, contact support.

data.name: cbBackupServer_Tooltip
data.value: Choose whether to stream to the default or the backup server. If you experience issues on a server, try the other.

data.name: msgLicenseOffer_StartStream
data.value:
{0} does not offer a public free streaming service. Streaming to {0} is therefore only available for licensed XSplit users.
Upgrade your license now?

data.name: lblLiveUsername
data.value: ID:

data.name: msgNotAllowedToReconfigureVec
data.value: Reconfiguration of other video encoding settings is not allowed during live stream.

data.name: msgAdjustmentTitle
data.value: Adjusting for YouTube Live compatibility

data.name: msgAPIError
data.value: There was an error in communicating with YouTube Live.

data.name: msgCategoryIsEmpty
data.value: Category must be specified.

data.name: msgDescriptionHasInvalidChars
data.value: The description cannot contain the characters '<' and '>'.

data.name: msgDescriptionMaxLength
data.value: The description cannot be more than 5000 characters (currently at {0}).

data.name: msgEmailAddressIsInvalid
data.value: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

data.name: msgEndContinuousLiveVideo
data.value:
You have stopped streaming to YouTube Live.
Would you like to end this live event as well?

data.name: msgNotAuthenticated
data.value: Please authenticate a user first.

data.name: msgStageFramerateAdjusted
data.value: Your frame rate has been changed to {0} FPS.

data.name: msgStageFramerateNotAdjusted
data.value: Unable to adjust your frame rate because you are currently streaming another channel. You may encounter problems with your stream.

data.name: msgStageResolutionAdjusted
data.value: Your stage resolution has been changed to {0}p.

data.name: msgStageResolutionAdjusted1
data.value: Your stage resolution has been changed to {0}p to match the event's resolution.

data.name: msgStreamResolutionAdjusted
data.value: Your broadcast resolution has been changed to {0}p.

data.name: msgStreamResolutionAdjusted1
data.value: Your broadcast resolution has been changed to {0}p to match the event's resolution.

data.name: msgStreamResolutionAdjustedXbc5003
data.value: Your output resolution has been changed to {0}p.

data.name: msgStreamResolutionAdjusted1Xbc5003
data.value: Your output resolution has been changed to {0}p to match the event's resolution.

data.name: msgTagMaxLength
data.value: The tag '{0}' is over the limit of 100 characters required by YouTube.

data.name: msgTagsHasInvalidChars
data.value: Tags may not contain the characters '<' and '>'.

data.name: msgTagsMaxLength
data.value: The total of all tags may not be more than 500 characters (currently at {0}).

data.name: msgTitleHasInvalidChars
data.value: The title cannot not contain the characters '<' and '>'.

data.name: msgTitleIsEmpty
data.value: Title cannot be empty.

data.name: msgTitleMaxLength
data.value: The title cannot be more than 100 characters (currently at {0}).

data.name: msgTOSNotAccepted
data.value:
You have not yet accepted YouTube Live's terms of service.
Please click [here](https://xspl.it/ytltos) to accept the terms and restart the authentication once you are done.

data.name: msgVideoBitrateAdjusted
data.value: Your video bitrate has been changed to {0}.

data.name: txtTags_Tooltip
data.value: Use commas to separate tags.

data.name: msgAPIError1
data.value: There was a problem communicating with the YouTube Live servers. This may be a network issue or you may not have access to YouTube Live.

data.name: msgBelowMinBitrate
data.value:
You have set a bitrate of {0}. This is below YouTube's minimum recommended bitrate of {1} for {2}. Please refer to the help (?) icon.
Continue anyway?

data.name: lblNote
data.value: Note: Some encoding settings may be disabled for compatibility with YouTube Live.

data.name: lnkSignUpHere
data.value: Having trouble streaming to YouTube? Learn how to get started here.

data.name: cbDetails
data.value: Set details before every broadcast

data.name: msgDailyLimitExceeded
data.value:
Daily limit for YouTube API has been exceeded. The quota will be reset at midnight Pacific Time (PT).
Please try again later.

data.value: YouTube API error was encountered.

data.name: cbManualTransition_Tooltip
data.value: Check this option to control the status of your broadcast from the YouTube Live Control Panel. If unchecked, XSplit will automatically transition status to "live" upon starting of broadcast and give option to "complete" it after stopping broadcast.

data.name: cbManualTransitionDisabled_Tooltip
data.value: Monitor stream is disabled for this event. Manual transition is not available.

data.name: cbManualTransitionDisabledForDefaultStream_Tooltip
data.value: Manual transition is not available for this event.

data.name: msgStreamNowIsMissing
data.value:
The default stream (Stream Now) in your YouTube channel does not appear to be set up yet.
Please go to your [live streaming dashboard](https://xspl.it/ytldashboard) or contact YouTube Live support.

data.name: msgStreamNowIsMissingUseAdhoc
data.value:
The default stream (Stream Now) in your YouTube channel does not appear to be set up yet.
Please go to your [live streaming dashboard](https://xspl.it/ytldashboard) or contact YouTube Live support.
Continue with New Live Event instead?

data.value:

Your output resolution has been changed to 1080p.
